Description: Wall sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat (black-figured) pottery bowl; interior glazed save for band near top; three added red bands lined in white; exterior: cream slip; part of a goose to left; filling ornaments: pendant roundels, dotted rosettes, dotted circles; red paint on alternate feather of goose's wing; incision used for details of goose; below, broad bands with added red band lined frame key maeander band.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.930)
